module.name: coffreader
module.short: Contains a resource reader for COFF files

descr.p: This unit contains , a TAbstractResourceReader descendant that is able to read COFF object files containing resources.
Adding this unit to a program's uses clause registers class with TResources.
This class provides a reader for COFF object files containing resources.
COFF is the file format used by Microsoft Windows object files. Usually resources get stored in a object file that can be given to a linker to produce an executable.
After an object file has been read, MachineType property holds the machine type the object file was built for.
descr.remark: This reader is not able to read full PE images. Use TWinPEImageResourceReader instead.

element.name: TCoffResourceReader.MachineType
element.short: The machine type of the object file

descr.p: This property holds the machine type of the object file that has been read.
descr.remark: Obviously, this property is meaningful only after an object file has been read.
